name: before the end (havenunearthly)
description:
Before The End...

Imagine living the simple life in little town, as a farmer, where you can pick crops, collect fruit, and fish! There's daily mail at the postal office and plenty to sell or buy at the market. Everyday after a long day's work, you come home to your cute pet and a journal to write into before the ned day. However, one day you get a letter from home, it's an emergency as your father has grown ill and you need to collect as much money as you can for a train ticket! Do your daily tasks and get yourself $100 for a train ticket!
